message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good deal.
I appreciate the offer Alice, but I think this split is more reflective of the fact that you lose value faster than I do with each passing round. Let's make a deal!
Bob, time is running out for both of us. This is a serious offer, let's close the deal and avoid losing more to inflation.
Alice, we're getting close!  This offer considers the time pressure and gives us both something substantial.  Let's wrap this up!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point. Take it or leave it.
